Thomas Rohde

Full Stack Software Engineer

About Me:

I am a Full Stack Software Engineer by way of the world of Theatre, Writing, and Art. I bring my artistic background, communication skills, and constant curiosity into the tech world. I love creating positive change through tech development and finding ways to make things work.

You can find me online at: GitHub and LinkedIn

in medias res

2 week build - in medias res is the journal app for the media that you love. It sidesteps the social media focus of other apps, so you can reflect instead of review and contemplate instead of comment. Created with React, Redux, Material UI, Express, Node.js, and Moment.

Neon Cinema:

36 hour build -- React movie catalogue app project. A new movie can be added and when a poster is clicked, we are able to view details on the movie.

Photo Gallery

36 hour build -- Photo gallery. When an image is clicked it flips to show details on the reverse side.
